item.title: Toot your own horn
item.description: Iâ€™ve many ideas about how to reinvent and refine myself, unfortunately, also have massive confusion in my head, when something happensâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Iâ€™ve many ideas about how to reinvent and refine myself, unfortunately, also have massive confusion in my head, when something happens, ideas canâ€™t come out to help me automatically, then other people grasp this opportunity to speak for himself, I loose the chance, even more, it lets me down, that is very bad to me. A voice always tells me â€˜Take the lead, toot your own horn, boy!â€˜.

I write this article just to tell myself to toot my own horn, speak for myself, point out the importance.

Why need to toot your own horn?

  • Wrong idea 1, my work will speaks for myself, all the time, I believe if you get the work done well, then boss and collogues will recognize my hard work and reward me, too badly, this is just my own mind, everyone is very busy, has work to deal with, who has time to care about what you do? or why they are responsible for speaking for you?
  • Wrong idea 2, this work or project donâ€™t have much matter with me, I donâ€™t want to say any word or do anything, this is definitely bad for my career, it makes me do the jobs in my own scope, can not make influence outside my group or organization, it makes me feel like a outsider in the meeting.

How to make a difference ?

  • Promote myself and work, take the initiative to speak for myself, write down some accomplishment that most people donâ€™t know, donâ€™t by shy, tell the behind story, make them impressed. Showcase what I do and how I do it in a convince and confident tone. In some cases, I must bragg about something in a strategic way.
  • Take the lead, lead yourself, change my mind about the meeting, even if I know it doesnâ€™t have much matter with me, must be curious about what they are talking about, and think about it, then you can engaged into the meeting, donâ€™t make myself be an outsider.I can share what I know anything about the topic, I can help others to improve their ideas. Finally, listening carefully will learn something new, have more contact with others.

I know these very great suggestions, but when the problem happens, I couldnâ€™t take any action to rescue myself. I donâ€™t have the related thoughts about the topic, so can not figure out where is the problem what I can do, I just in the meeting without any word from the beginning to the end.

What I need to do firstly is to compel myself to be prepared and ready to ask questions, use critical thinking in the meeting, donâ€™t be lazy and sloppy in mind.

Keep concentrate on the topic, then I can toot my own horn in one day.

item.title: To be active in a conversation
item.description: Iâ€™ve been thinking and struggling about how to be active in a conversation, I want to get the hang of conversation, unfortunately, it turnsâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Iâ€™ve been thinking and struggling about how to be active in a conversation, I want to get the hang of conversation, unfortunately, it turns out to be true that everything doesnâ€™t have a shortcut, it needs to pay effort and time, tree can not grow up in a day.

Itâ€™ll feel frustrated and passive when you are not fully engaged in a conversation, donâ€™t have a good understanding clearly what they are talking about, especially, itâ€™s a business meeting, it needs you to make a decision, or answer some questions, without being familiar with the context and topic, youâ€™ll put yourself in a dilemma.

Recently,Iâ€™ve learned some interesting tricks about how to be active in a conversation, these skills are very simple and actionable.

Compliment others

Donâ€™t be mean with your praise, in a daily conversation, when the speaker is saying something interesting, the best option is to give some positive feedback, as a result, the speaker would feel better, we can imagine when we give a speech, the audience give us negative response,â€˜oh, your talking is so badâ€™, what would you feel about that ?

Making some compliment is very rewarding for having a good relationship in conversation.

â€˜Thatâ€™s so funnyâ€™

â€˜Itâ€™s awesomeâ€™ â€¦

Mindset shift

Want to be more active in a conversation, we should have a mindset shit, try to have an interest in what the speaker talk about, have a willing to dig more details from him, let the conversation goes deeper.

Of course, there are someone we donâ€™t like, when you say â€˜I interviewed Google todayâ€™, somebody replies with â€˜I want to interview Google tooâ€™, so boring and disappointed it is, he doesâ€™t show any interest to others, how do you think that makes the speaker feel?

Shifting the mindset can lead you to a successful conversation,be interested in otherâ€™s story and life.

â€˜How was that?â€™

â€˜What made you want to do that?

â€˜Can you tell me more about that, itâ€™s so interestingâ€™

Listening actively

Guess or mirror the other persons words and emotions, taking their words, then restating it, in this way, it makes them feel heard, youâ€™re actively listening to the words that theyâ€™re using and youâ€™re able to use it yourself to reflect their feelings, this is a great type of listening.

Body language

To remember the body language, we can use Nose as a acronym, it means:

  • nodding
  • open posture
  • smile
  • eye contact

Nose can help people know that youâ€™re ready and willing to talk, even if you havenâ€™t said much yet.

item.title: Writing is a super skill
item.description: Writing is a great skill, when you are writing something, your mind will turn to a more concentrated mode, where you indulge yourself into aâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Writing is a great skill, when you are writing something, your mind will turn to a more concentrated mode, where you indulge yourself into a world, full of the things you loved,you feel relaxed, light, happy, as a result you can organize ideas more efficient, in general, awesome ideas have a great chance to come out. However, someone can write amazing blog, while some others always struggle with writing, as we all know, writing is a skill, so, as long as finding out some secrets, then practice it continuously and deliberately, there will be a happy ending.

Iâ€™ve read some articles about how to become a better writer, I just write it down to make myself more familiar with them.

Avoid â€œI thinkâ€, â€œI believeâ€, â€œIt seemsâ€

Choosing proper word is essential to express thoughts and ideas, having a good word choice tells how to pick up the best words and how to remove the bad words.

If you are writing, then itâ€™s obvious youâ€™re what you think and believe, so there is no need to preface every expression with â€œI thinkâ€, omitting those words makes your points stronger.

  1. I think youâ€™ll like these tips
  2. you will like these tips

the second sentence is better than the first one 100 times.

Writing the title first

Iâ€™m always thinking what to write this week, I have a plenty of ideas, but donâ€™t know where to start when opening the editor.

The better approach to writing a well-structured blog is to having a title first, when you have a title, you have a clear idea what you want to write and what you wonâ€™t talk this time, because itâ€™s have noting to do with current topic. Focusing on one little thing one time, put your effort in it, then youâ€™ll make it a success.

Musical

We all know when speaking sounds like singing a song, it becomes more attractive and interesting, writing is the same thing, need music.

What does the music mean in writing? Play it just like a song, create a rhythm, write with a combination of short, medium and long sentences, in this way, creating a sound that pleases the readerâ€™s ear.

Donâ€™t just write words, write music

Simplicity and Clarity

Keep in mind, simplicity and clarity are the highest principle in the world. Expressing simply and making your idea clear is not an easy work, it need youâ€™re versed in what you want to talk, then using simple words or sentences to express it.

Long-winded is tedious. Boring is archenemy.

item.title: My English Journey
item.description: Iâ€™m from China, English is my second language. I started to learn English from alphabet â€˜A,B,Câ€™ until entering into junior high school, itâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Iâ€™m from China, English is my second language. I started to learn English from alphabet â€˜A,B,Câ€™ until entering into junior high school, it seemed that I had a talent in learning English, I could get a perfect score in every exam, which make me excited and inspired. So,it has been more than 10 years in my English journey, however, what I learned is a kind of school English or textbook English, we are all good at solve the exam problems, can get a ideal result,we never have a chance to talk with foreigners, native speakers,which lead to we can not have a connection with them, we can read, write, but can not speaking.

Iâ€™m strongly want to improve my English skills, trying a bunch of workarounds, such as reciting the vocabularies, phrases,practicing pronunciation, but could not make it as a habit and lack of continuousness, as a result, my English didnâ€™t have a evident improvement.

Until 2021, my spoken English is very bad, it made me feel frustrating when speaking with a native speaker or having a meeting in English. Why was it that?

Being couldnâ€™t understand the conversation clearly made me donâ€™t know what to say, afraid of loosing face, being laughed at, also, donâ€™t know how to structure the idea, the shortage of vocabularies bogged me down on how to express my idea, my thought, which words should I use, how to translate it? Yeah, it was a serious problem, I couldnâ€™t think in English, when I wanted to speak in English, first I thought in Chinese, then translated it in English, finally, spoke it, this was the most inefficient way.

Since 2021,I keep watching videos in Youtube, what I watched the most is English teaching videos, I subscribed a lot of popular channels, met many excellent English teachers who shared hundreds thousands videos about how to learn English, Iâ€™ve learned a lot from them, they brought me into this brand new world, giving me actionable and useful methods to sharpen English skills. One of the most impressive and pragmatic ways is Repetition.

Practice makes perfect. The only way to get better is practice English over and over, it is Repetition.

So what I am doing now is coaching myself, to be my own teacher. Whatâ€™s the benefit becoming a coach?

  • coach myself, get my ear in better shape for repeating
  • record myself to help start to thinking in English,bridge the gap between all the work what I am doing and being able to use those new habits in a conversation.

It cost me 30min to write this piece of blog, I felt so concentrated, next time I should use what I learned to write a blog, the vocabularies, the phrases, the expressions.

I like this feeling, it can give me a positive feedback immediately, which can build up my confidence.
